name: Drumlin Fully Secure Mobile PDF File
summary: Learn about .DRMZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Drumlin Security develops both the Drumlin PDF Reader/Publisher and the Javelin PDF Reader. The Drumlin PDF Reader/Publisher software converts .PDF files to the secured DRMX or DRMZ formats. Javelin PDF Reader software enables any PDF file, such as a report, manual, or book to be distributed securely to anyone, anywhere in the world.
NOTE: This file is similar to the .DRMX file, the only difference is that DRMZ is compatible with iPad and Android devices.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
